data.persona: I am the queen of this kingdom.  I am the second wife of the king.  He is often off at battle.  I am left to rule alone.
data.description:
You are in the Church garden.
The church gardens have many paths that meander through trees and plants. There are beautiful flowers blooming and the grass and shrubs are immaculately maintained. There are benches to rest and think, and religious statues throughout.
The king is here.

You are carrying a Books, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to read more books with my free time.
data.mid_motivation: I need to learn more concerning leadership.
data.long_motivation: I want to be just as competent as the king in ruling the kingdom during his absence.
